original_text: They did this, and when Aaron stretched out his hand with the staff and struck the dust of the ground, gnats came on people and animals. All the dust throughout the land of Egypt became gnats.
korean_text: 그들이 그대로 행할새 아론이 지팡이를 잡고 손을 들어 땅의 티끌을 치매 애굽 온 땅의 티끌이 다 이가 되어 사람과 가축에게 오르니

sentences.original_text: and when Aaron stretched out his hand with the staff
sentences.korean_translation: 아론이 지팡이를 들고 손을 뻗었을 때

sentences.original_text: and struck the dust of the ground
gnats came on people and animals
All the dust throughout the land of Egypt
